specialAbilities.name: Elemental Demise
specialAbilities.description: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreeti was wearing or carrying.

specialAbilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: The efreeti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (5d6) fire damage.
